inn1.comm: tries to rap him on the gloves there, banged in short on middle, Smith moved back, closed the face and turned it behind square for a single
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and cracks it towards point with an open face, bowled at 146.2 kph

hitting the bat hard is the man, bowled beautifully in the last game, was deceptive with his slower deliveries, this one's hit the pitch hard, jumps up from middle and is punched into the off side for a quick single
short of a good length on leg stump, pushes it with a straight bat towards a widish mid-on
short of a good length again, no movement yet, no swing at all, holds its line, defended solidly in the direction of cover
strikes him on the thigh as he tries to whip it square, lands outside leg, rolls towards point, good start by Shoaib
gentle medium to begin with, 124.9 kmph, lands on a good length on middle, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
just a hint of inward movement there, drew him forward with a good length delivery and nipped back in just as he reached to push that towards mid-off
shot, short of a good length, stands tall and crunches it between point and cover for the game's first boundary, opened the face and cracked it square
maintaining that length, takes a couple of steps forward on the pitch and dabs him towards point
the bounce is true on this pitch, landed short outside off and he pulled it slightly uppishly between midwicket and mid-on for a brace
just one slip and that was edged, would have been well wide of second as well, wanted to drive that on the up through the off side, rolls down towards third man for a single
the slower one again, cut away, bowled at 123 kmph, landed on middle and Smith played it too early, nipped away past the outside edge deceiving even the wicketkeeper who conceded a bye
short on the off, rose up and he was in a good position to play the pull but didn't time it well enough, straight to mid-on
nipped back in from a good length outside off, Amla was cramped there, knocked it down on the pitch, it bounced back into his pads
slower one bowled fuller outside off, turns the face and places it wide of midwicket for a quick single, picked it this time, the offcutter again
short on middle, gets back and drops it back towards the bowler with a straight bat
slower one again, held back the length there, Smith was content to stay in his crease and play it towards cover
a fraction short outside off, waits for it and taps it down towards third man for a single
cautiously played, moved back in his crease to that shortish delivery and patted it back with a full face
bowls it on a good length, steps forward and pushes it firmly towards extra cover
slower one bowled full outside off, mistimes a drive straight to mid-off
bowls it short of a good length on the off, punched towards extra cover
slower one, a bit of width this time and Smith cashes in, gets to the pitch and flays it wide of cover for a boundary, freed his arms there, a gift ball of sorts after a reasonably tight over
didn't pick the slower one there though the idea was right, short ball well outside off and Amla had made his mind up to dispatch it over midwicket, couldn't connect though
short, quicker this time, and pulled hard but just wide of Wahab Riaz at mid-on who dives but can't quite stop it, not much damage done, just the single
lovely timing, that's his favourite shot, good length ball on the pads and it's a flick past midwicket, Asad Shafiq gives chase and dives needlessly, that was always going to be four
pushed off the front foot towards mid-off, there's no slip now
nice timing again, shortish delivery on leg stump and it's punched past a short midwicket who's been placed there exactly for that shot, Akhtar is not happy with himself
slower one on the off stump, 118 kmph and it's driven hard and beautifully but Akhtar gets in the way, kicking it away and giving the batsman a cold stare. A solid start this for South Africa
lovely, that was bowled reasonably wide of the off stump, Amla moved all the way across and whipped it through square leg, there's protection in the deep though
short, and it's crashed off the back foot but it's well fielded by Shafiq at point who hurls himself to his right
defended solidly on the side of the pitch
pitched up slightly, driven firmly but straight to mid-off
mid-on is a little deep and Smith, this time, just pushes it gently towards that fielder to sneak in a quick single
easily done, a rubbish delivery outside off, short and wide and it's smacked through point for a boundary
Smith and Amla are looking good here, seized the length early, Shoaib dragged that short on middle and it was thumped through midwicket
fires it on a good length on middle and is met respectfully by Smith onto the pitch
bangs it short outside off, it's handled well by Smith who gets on top of it and takes his bottom-hand off, nicely done
slower one this time, Smith came down the track while simultaneously making room, picked the slower one there but again, drove it well but straight to mid-off
there is a deep square leg in place and this one goes straight to him, whipped off the back foot

short of a length outside off, Amla senses a chance and rightly opts for a pull but was a little late on the shot it seems, tried to smack it over midwicket, got the top edge and was taken comfortably by Imran Farhat at midwicket
short on middle by Razzaq, is pulled away by Smith well wide of deep square leg for a couple of runs
bowled it on a good length on the off, defended watchfully by Smith into the leg side
shortish on leg stump, attempting his favoured flick again but can't connect, is struck on the thigh
midwicket, straight to him, straying on leg stump and it's Smith's zone but can't quite pierce the field this time
holds its line, lands on a good length on the off, 127.6 kmph, and is defended solidly
slower one bowled short outside leg and cuts back in, tries to turn the face on it but can't connect and is struck on the pad
ruffles up Kallis with a short delivery on middle, fends it away towards fine leg for a single to get off the mark
round the wicket to Smith who knocks it just wide of midwicket for a quick single

worked away into the leg side towards midwicket, not far from the fielder and he opts for the single, makes it in time and would have been in even if it was a direct hit, stretched hard and tumbled and hurt his wrist in the process, the magic spray is out
slower one bowled short outside off, guided off the back foot towards third man for a single
punched towards point, targeting the off stump is Shoaib
short of a good length on the off, gets back and pushes it towards extra cover
that's 5000 runs for Smith as a captain, whipped towards fine leg for a single.
confidently played, full, a meaty ball on middle and leg and is driven stylishly down the ground to beat mid-on to the ropes
turned the face a little too early there, was looking for the on-drive past mid-on, it held its line and took the leading edge, rolled towards extra cover
short of a good length outside off, cracked straight towards point
poor delivery on the leg stump, Kallis comes forward a couple of steps and clips it over short fine leg for an easy boundary, more a leg gully that, Akhtar's the man there
pitched up outside off, driven crisply but to mid-off
starts with a shortish delivery outside off, pulled towards deep square leg for a single
a hint of movement for Riaz, it nips back in from a short of a good length outside off, defended on the pitch
nips back in again and catches him on the thigh, tries to work it past midwicket but is beaten by the movement
slightly short outside off, punched back towards the bowler on the bounce
a bit of a shuffle from Kallis, turns his wrists and rolls it between midwicket and mid-on for a couple of runs
short of a good length outside off, punched towards mid-off
strays on the pads from round the wicket, not much spin on that one, tickled towards short fine leg
back of a length on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it to midwicket
comes down the track but he holds his length back and bowls it flat, defended towards midwicket
flat, bowled on a good length on leg stump, drops it into the leg side and is off for a single
turns in from a good length outside off, punched wide of extra cover for an easy single
quicker through the air, fires it short on middle, whipped towards deep midwicket for one more

run-out appeal, slower one bowled short on middle, turned behind square, they pick the single and Smith was determined to get the second, collided with the bowler on his way back but the dive and a slightly high throw saved him, was well in
short outside off, slaps it straight to mid-on, misfield and they allow him a single, Shoaib Akhtar the culprit there
bowls it on a good length on the off, defended from the crease into the off side
shortish on the off, punched towards extra cover, no single again
opted to play the pull off a ball that wasn't quite there for that shot, was bowled on a length and he got an inside edge onto his pads, a single in front of square leg
bouncer but a touch too high thinks Smith and opts out a shot, the umpire doesn't think so and it counts as a dot
a flat trajectory there, pushed wide of the bowler for a single to long-on
looping it just outside off, gets forward and plays it back to the bowler
quicker delivery on middle and leg, sweeps it towards short fine and races down the pitch for a single
fullish outside off, gets across and drives it straight to midwicket
a bit of flight on that one, pushed back towards the bowler

finds the fielder in the deep, the frustration was building a little, Pakistan have kept things quiet this Powerplay, Hafeez pushed that full outside off and Kallis went for the slog-sweep, connected well but found a perfectly-positioned deep midwicket, Pakistan have clawed back
short outside off, Smith slashes at that one, third man is wide and has no chance to cut that off
the pressure is easing off at the other end, back-to-back boundaries after a wicket, lands on a good length and is wide, gets forward and steers it wide of a diving point
shortish outside off, taps it down towards third man for a single
shortish outside off, Ab's off the mark, reaching for it a touch and guiding it down to third man
slower one that was picked, Smith will be disappointed he didn't get that away, drives it straight to midwicket, Smith is complaining about the sightscreen, some movement there

lovely, picked his spot, short outside off, not much room so couldn't free his arms but delicately guided it past the keeper to beat third man to the ropes, three fours in that over and Smith has helped compensate for the blip in the second Powerplay
flat, bowled on a good length outside off, pushed off the front foot to extr acover
comes down the track and works it just wide of midwicket for a single
short of a good length on the off, punched back to the bowler
fullish on middle, driven wide of long-on, a firm push and reaches his 42nd ODI half-century, nicely-paced, confident innings
full on the off, pushed to extra cover
keeps it flat, turns back in from outside off, defended into the off side and it's drinks
turns in from a good length outside off, knocks it down into the leg side for a single
pitched up outside off, eased towards deep cover for a single
tossed up outside off, gets forward and drives it down to long-on for a single
hurries it on middle, worked behind square for a single
tossed up  outside off, gets forward and pushes it towards extra cover
pitched up on leg stump, was the googly, tried to drive it into the leg side, got a leading edge and it rolled towards long-off
Hafeez fires it on middle and leg from round the wicket, Smith bends low and paddles it fine for a couple of runs
fullish on the off, pushed towards long-on for a single
shortish on middle, punched wide of midwicket for a single
found the gap and poor fielding in the deep, Smith moved across and swept it hard over square leg, Farhat was the man in the deep and mistimed his dive and let it through
defended watchfully into the off side
takes it from a good length and pushes it to long-on for a single
the googly on middle and off, Smith just plays it back towards the bowler
googly again, held back his length, guides it towards point
flighted outside off, eases it towards long-off for a single
short of a good length on the off, holds its line, punches it towards midwicket
turned in the direction of square leg for a quick single
tries to force it through the off side, gets a thick outside edge towards short third man
round the wicket to the right hander, flat and not much turn, defended back to the bowler
gives it some flight this time, pushed down the ground to long-on
slower through the air and turned in, surprised Smith a hint there who played it onto his pads
quickish, pushed away wide of midwicket off the back foot for a single
gave it a bit of air, guided towards point, nice tight over this
slightly short on the off, wristily worked away towards square leg for a single
Afridi pushes that full on middle, it's played down the ground past him
the googly there, tries to cut that shortish delivery but can't connect
reaches forward and drives it well but straight towards extra cover where it's fielded sharply
the offspinner bowled short outside off, guided towards short third man for a quick single
drifting into middle, turned towards square leg for a quick single, 100 up
sweeps it towards deep square leg for a single
turning in from outside off, dabs it into the leg side after walking across
varying his pace well, quicker one this time, knocks it into the leg side for one more
fullish, played straight towards midwicket
tickled into the leg side wide of square leg for a single, fetched it from outside off
quicker through the air, AB's looking for ways to score, steps out of the crease and just defends it to cover
good stuff, slowed it down and got some turn, AB covered it well but all he could do was tap it into the off side
putting pressure on the fielder there, forced it into the leg side wide of the fielder at long-on, they race back for the second as the fielder fumbles
drops it in front of cover for a quick single
well taken by Haider behind the stumps, fired it down the leg side and he snapped it one-handed
appeal for lbw, slanting on leg stump, didn't straighten, tries to turn it into the leg side, got an inside edge onto the pads and probably would have missed leg
flighted on the off, driven towards extra cover, another dot ball
quicker ball taken on the full by AB, pushed into the leg side for a single
a mix-up, some hesitation there as it's played into the off side, Smith calls, AB responds but then decides against it, sends Smith back who makes it easily
flattish on middle, gets across and defends it back towards the bowler
tight line, just on and around off stump, defended into the off side
fired it short on middle, whipped it towards deep midwicket for a single
gets well across and clips it behind square leg for a single
short on the off, a half-pull towards deep midwicket to raise the 50-partnership, in reasonably quick time as well
comes down the track and tries to whip him over midwicket, is struck on the pads instead
flighted outside off, presses it just wide of extra cover, Smith calls for a single and makes it well in time
the googly, shaped up for the sweep expecting it to turn in but it spun away and beat the swing of the bat
full toss and SMith makes sure he doesn't waste it, picked the gap, slapping it between deep square leg and deep midwicket for a boundary
bowled it full on the off, eased towards extra cover, decides against the single
shortish outside off, smacked wide of cover into the deep for a single
comes down the track and Afridi fires it quick, pushed into the leg-side field for a single towards deep midwicket
defended onto the pitch from the crease
shortish outside off, knocks it towards point, a bit of width but wasn't able to do much with it
short outside off, drags it towards deep midwicket for a single
gets on the back foot and taps it just wide of midwicket for a single
gets on the front foot and places it just wide of short cover to sneak in one more
turning in from a good length outside off, tries to work it through the leg side, gets an inside edge onto the pads
converts that into a low full toss and drives it past midwicket
pitched up on the off, drilled down the ground to long-off
elegantly done, tossed up and lands on a length outside off, just chips it over extra cover for a couple of runs
angling in towards leg stump, dabs it in front of midwicket for one more
pitched up on the off, eased towards long-off for a single
flighted outside off, steered towards deep point for one more to keep the strike
short on the off, slapped it towards deep midwicket for a single
trying to be aggressive there, stepped out of the crease and looked to launch it over midwicket, mistimed it and only earned a single
driven crisply towards deep cover for a single
whipped wide of Afridi at short fine for one more
dabbed it wide of the bowler from the crease, Rehman needlessly aims at the stumps at the non-striker's end, concedes an overthrow
quicker ball bowled short outside off, chops it towards point, no single on offer there

dealt with the short ball, pulled it hard wide of Akhtar at long-on, he runs across and kicks it in, Afridi expected a better effort there, three runs when it could have been just two had he bent low and picked it up
gets forward, closes the face and works it into the leg side
flighted on middle, driven down the ground to long-on
short on middle and off, punched it towards deep extra cover for a single
the googly, short long hop and it's pulled but straight to deep midwicket, just the single
turning in from short of a length outside off, chops it wide of short third man for a single, a good diving save there

missed run-out, Shafiq misses out and so does Haider, tapped in front of point and they decide in favour of a single, wrong call, Shafiq gathers and returns an awkward throw to the keeper who could not get his body behind it, Smith was gone had that hit or had Haider gathered it cleanly
wide down the leg side, saw him come down and fired it down but a touch too wide, no chance for Haider to gather it, easy runs these
pushed down towards long-on for a single
played past cover into the deep for one more
short outside off, waits for it to turn in and cuts it towards deep point for a single, South Africa moving along nicely
shortish on leg stump, punched towards deep midwicket for just the single
flighted outside off, gets outside the line and turns it in front of square
shortish outside off, punched towards long-on, Akhtar runs in and fumbles, allowing them to come back for the second
a bit of turn away from the batsman this time, defended towards extra cover

he's given him, Smith has been dismissed in the nineties, quicker delivery bowled slightly short on middle and leg, Smith got a little across and tried to punch it past midwicket, missed and was struck on the pads, we need a replay to check what happened there, Smith isn't happy as he heads back after laying a solid platform for his team. Replays indicate that would have hit middle. Struck in line and it was heading on.
tossed up on leg stump, driven to long-on for a single to get off the mark

missed run-out, goes for the sweep and it rolls towards short fine, Duminy doesn't want the single and sends AB back who would have been short had that hit at the non-striker's end, they get an overthrow on top of it
pushed into the off side
short of a good length, punched off the back foot past extra cover
turning in from a good length outside off, defended back to the bowler
shortish, dabs it just wide of point for a single
flighted this time, driven straight to extra cover
short outside off, slashes it hard and gets a thick outside edge wide of third man
turned behind square for a single this time
good length on middle, gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
shortish outside off, guides it towards third man for one more
drops it behind point for a single, a workmanlike innings from AB today
beaten this time, nipped away after landing short of a good length, Duminy tried to open the face and it just moved away past him, was fortunate not get an outside edge
pushed it on a good length outside off, tapped to cover
quicker through the air, pats it back to the bowler on the front foot
waits for it to turn away and punches it past the bowler for a single
moved well across, did he get a nick, tried to work it fine, clipped the pads and the keeper fumbled it
sharp turn there, moved well across and turned in quite a bit, took the pad and Haider fumbled yet again
low full toss on middle, played wide of midwicket for a single
short of a good length on the off, pushed past point but no single there
tight line on middle, knocks it down wide of midwicket to steal one
AB is content to just steer it down to third man
short on middle, mistimes a pull to deep midwicket for just the single
gets across and nudges it wide of short fine for one more
pitched up on the off, comes down the track and drops it into the leg side, the fielder at deep square leg takes a while to get to it and they complete the second without any fuss
fullish outside off, knocked in front of cover for a single
slower through the air, turns in from outside off, plays it back to the bowler
turning in from the off stump, closes the face and plays it to midwicket
turns in, wristily works it wide of square leg to keep the strike
short of a good length outside off, leaves it be
slower one bowled full on leg stump, tickled past square leg
shortish on leg stump, tries to nudge it into the leg side, is struck high on the pads and sneaks a leg bye
straying on the pads, would be disappointed to not give that the treatment, brushes the pads, another leg bye
bowls it on a good length on middle, defended on the pitch, thought of a single but it's not there
fullish outside off, gets forward and slices it past point for a couple into the deep
turning in from outside off, moved across to work it fine, struck high on the pads
flights it on the off, gets across and turns it to midwicket
turning in from a good length outside off, tries to dab it behind point, gets an inside edge onto the pads
fires it short on leg stump, dabs it in front of square leg to sneak one
the arm ball, bowled on a good length on middle, defended to extra cover
shortish, punched off the back foot to point, a dot ball, ends Rehman's spell, a tidy one albeit wicketless
shortish on middle, hurries up to Duminy who gets on the back foot and defends it respectfully
a hint of width there and Duminy runs it down to third man for just the single
moving around the crease to unsettle the bowler is AB, in the end he just guides it to third man
round the wicket, bowled short on the off stump, taps it to third man for one more
nipped back in just slightly, Ab moved outside the line and had to adjust to the inward movement, opted to to defend it straight to extra cover

short outside off, tries to whip it through the leg side but it just isn't there for that shot, gets it high on the bat as he tries to slap it past the bowler, falls short of Gul, the substitute fielder, at mid-off, a direct hit but he's in and what's more, they get a run off the ricochet
full outside off and Duminy has shaped up for a slog-sweep, gets an inside edge onto his pads as he tries to clear midwicket
bunts it into the leg side for a single
sees him come down and holds back the length, catches him high on the pad as he tries to work it through the leg side
fullish on middle, placed wide of midwicket for a single
the offspinner, turning away from outside leg, defended back to the bowler
cracked hard through the off side towards deep extra cover for just the single
presents the full face and pushes it to mid-off for a quick single

gone, de Villiers has been dismissed for 49, full outside off and he was looking to carve that past point, sliced it straight to the fielder, Hafeez it was who took it comfortably, Pakistan have pulled things back again
almost a yorker, full on middle from round the wicket, flicked towards deep midwicket to get off the mark
nicely timed, mid-off is up and he tried to force it past the in-field but Afridi, stationed at extra cover, dived to his right and saved a couple of runs
short of a length on middle, whipped it through square leg, in front of the fielder and they have enough time for the second
edged, short of a good length and cut away, tried to defend it off the back foot, took the outside edge and fell short of Younis Khan at a wide gully
tossed up on the off, pushed between point and cover for a single
the googly, shortish outside off, dabs it in front of short third for a single
the googly and he shaped himself up for a cut, it turned away to beat the bat, would be disappointed for missing out
short of a good length, punched off the back foot to cover
the offspinner again, short outside off, slashes hard but makes no contact, the pressure builds
short and wide and Ingram mistimes a cut towards extra cover, excellent over by Afridi
angling in towards middle from round the wicket, turned past midwicket for a couple
short and wide and he breaks the boundary-drought, cut away hard past point to beat third man to the boundary, 200 up
short on the off, gets on top of it and knocks it in front of point for a single
didn't pick the slower one there, Ingram moved away and was looking to launch it over midwicket, was fortunate to get an inside edge onto his pads, just the single but he was almost gone there
bouncer, a quick one as well but that was a touch too high and is called by the umpire
full on leg stump, driven well wide of deep midwicket for a couple of runs
angling it on the pads and it's nicely flicked towards fine leg for a single
tossed up on the off, pushed down towards long-on for a single
dropped, that was the offspinner, Ingram made room to cut, got a thick edge but Haider couldn't snap it behind the stumps
fires it down the leg side and it's called a wide, Duminy misses the sweep
the offspinner again and beats the batsman completely as it shoots away from middle to beat the outside edge
the offspinner again, is pushed away into the off side
a quicker delivery down the leg side and Ingram goes for the sweep, catches the glove to beat the keeper and short fine leg for a boundary
short outside off, slashes hard, gets a lot of elevation on it but not the intended direction, just the single towards deep cover
full outside off, moves across to thwack it into the leg side, misses and it goes through to the keeper
yorker length, just missed leg stump, through Ingram as he tries to crack it through midwicket, can't connect
slower one bowled short outside off, punched off the back foot to extra cover, direct hit from Younis Khan and it's referred, replays show Ingram has just made it in
pitched it up outside off, mistimes a drive and plays it to point
lands on a good length outside off, made room to carve that over the in-field on the off side, missed out
lands on a good length outside off, drags it towards deep square leg, just the single, a tight over from Riaz
in the blockhole outside off, digs it out behind point who dives to his right to keep  them down to one
well placed, pushed into the leg side well wide of the bowler, Hafeez has to run back and haul it in, they've had enough time to complete the second
short of a length on the off, cut just wide of point for a quick single
dropped, Pakistan haven't been great in the field today, short and it's pulled straight to deep midwicket and Farhat spills a sitter
quicker ball on middle and leg, played back to the bowler
short on the off, punched off the back foot to extra cover on the edge of the circle, single taken
bowled'im. Yorker on middle and leg, Duminy made room and wanted to swing it over midwicket, swung hard but missed and the stumps took a beating

two in two, lovely bowling, on a hat-trick now, the inswinging yorker and Miller can't dig it out, a nightmare of a ball to receive first up and he can't negotiate it, Pakistan, again, have clawed back
yorker again, but it's dug out, just a fraction outside off and it's played wide of midwicket, survives
four, short and wide and he slashes hard, gets a thick outside edge over slip for a one bounce four
Botha doing his bit here, full toss, attempting another yorker but couldn't quite get it right this time, punched hard past extra cover and the fielder in the deep dives valiantly but can't get to it
full on middle, driven back hard but the bowler kicks it away, just the single wide of square leg, a slightly expensive over but two wickets more than make up for it
shot, had made his mind up, Hafeez pushed it full on middle and Botha reverse-swept it hard over point for a one bounce four, he's stepping up here
down the leg side but not given a wide because Botha tried playing the reverse-sweep again
another four, pushed it quick but Botha's committed to the reverse-sweep and places it perfectly past point
short on middle, rocks back and pulls it down to deep square leg for a single
tossed up on the off, makes room and cracks it wide of Afridi at extra cover, he slides to his right and keeps them down to a single
fires it wide of off stump, Botha wants to reverse-paddle that but it was bowled a touch too quick and he missed the bus
aiming for the yorker but went wrong, full toss and Ingram tonks him over mid-off for an easy boundary, the field is up and it's as bad a ball that he can  bowl
missed out this time, an inswinging full toss, tries to smack it through midwicket but missed and was struck on the pad, a leg bye is all he'll get, 250 up
lovely paddle, pre-meditated, full on the off stump, moved his front foot across and Marilliered it over short fine for a one bounce four, almost went all the way, what a wonderful cameo this is
swinging in, lands on a length, tries to force it through midwicket, is struck on the pads, gets a leg bye
called a no-ball for height, was over the waist and Ingram mistimed a pull wide of deep midwicket, a couple of runs
another full toss, tries a shot similar to the one he played earlier in the over, aiming to cart it over mid-off but mistimes it this time, just the single

Botha's toying with the bowling here, Riaz's yorker have disappeared, he's not able to get them through and South Africa are cashing in on the full tosses, a low full toss outside off and out comes the paddle again, over short fine for four more
yorker first up, digs it out towards point for a single
almost bowled, inswinging yorker, made too much room did Botha and couldn't quite reach it in the end, didn't miss the off stump by much
full outside off and tries to thwack that through the covers, driven straight to extra cover, just the single
superb yorker on middle, not much Ingram can do, dabs it towards point for a single
too wide, called one by the umpire, they steal a bye and Haider's throw has no one to back up, another run, three in all
another yorker, made room and respectfully dropped that in front of point for a single
aiming for another yorker but can't get it right this time, full toss that is thumped over the covers for a boundary

inn2.comm: short of a length on the hip and neatly worked out through square leg...it's important to make the most of the hard, new ball both for the batsmen and bowlers
on leg stump again, takes the pad this time towards fine leg
well bowled, but a poor shot, as this one is full outside off but Hafeez plays a half-hearted drive and gets beaten
makes good connection this time, it's on off stump and he leans into a strong drive which finds its way through the cover ring...but the outfield is fairly heavy and the ball slows up
finds the outside edge as he pushes off the back foot and it flew through a fine gully position down to third man

gone! Early breakthrough. Morkel goes round the wicket and the plan pays off as this full delivery catches Farhat flat-footed on the crease. He tried to drive, but didn't make contact and was taken in front of off stump
carved in the air just over backward point, not far away from a catch, and it races towards third man where Morkel makes a good save
outside off stump, comes forward with bat and pad together and defends to cover
defended to cover again
more excellent fielding, this time from Graeme Smith, as he chases this drive out to the cover boundary and saves a run
a slower ball which is punched up to mid-off
lucky! He comes forward and gets an inside edge past the stumps which shoots towards fine leg where there's another sprawling South African fielding to stop a boundary
full on the stumps and worked out to square leg
flicked in the air but beautifully timed through midwicket...again, though, the outfield plays a part in preventing a boundary
very full at the stumps and Younis drives it down to mid-off
touch shorter this time and it's worked around the corner down to long leg
nice drive from Hafeez but he can't find the gap and it's a scampered single to the left of mid-off
good shot, nice on-drive by Younis and it brings him a couple more
bowls it on a good length outside off, holds its line, shoulders arms to that one
short of a good length  but  a touch too wide this time, called by the umpire
gets it right this time, just around off stump and held back the length a little there, punched back to the bowler
pitched up, was in the slot and he cracked it well but straight to extra cover, missed opportunity there
nicely done, lovely timing, on middle and leg, gets forward and executes a delightlful on-drive past mid-on for three runs
lands on a good length on the off, pushed through to mid-off
short and wide, slashes hard, flies off the outside edge on the bounce to third man, just the single
lands on a good length outside off and shapes in, leaves it be
ooh, just short, pitched up outside off, driven slightly uppishly and lands just short of Kallis at short extra cover
on middle and leg, gets on the back foot and whips it past square leg for a single
angling in towards middle, gets across and clips it over square leg, wristily done, a couple of bounces over the ropes
lands on a length and he tries to drive it on the up, straight to short extra cover though
back of a length on the off, stands tall and defends it to cover
jaffa to begin with, angling in towards off and nipping away just at the right time to beat the outside edge, beauty
short of a good length outside off, chopped down towards third man for a single
banged in short and he adjusted to the length quickly, rocking back and pulling him hard over square leg for a boundary
shaky Hafeez there, there was some swing and it moved away after Steyn drew him forward, tried to push at it, got a thick outside edge towards third man
superb stuff, pitched up and he just leans forward to ease that past the bowler and mid-off for a boundary, presented the full face and it was all timing
beaten this time as Steyn gets one to shoot away after pitching on a good length, Hafeez pretended to withdraw his bat but he knew he was beaten
Morne hits the pitch hard, short of a good length outside off, holds its line, left alone
full on middle, pushed wide of mid-on and sneaks a quick single
angling in towards the off stump, taps it past the bowler and just wide of mid-off for a single
drops it short on the off stump, gets behind it and knocks it down in front of point
shortish outside off again, gets back and pats it towards cover
slower one this time, 118.1 kmph, Younis didn't pick it, tried to drive that hard past mid-off, the bat turned as he made contact and the ball dropped into the leg side
ooh, almost caught, lands on a good length and Hafeez goes through with the attempted drive, chips it over extra cover for three runs, just over
and Steyn replies with another jaffa, this time to Younis, nips away from a good length to beat the batsman, AB behind the stumps is enjoying this, so are we
fullish outside off, drives it straight to cover this time
comes back in from middle, adjusts well and knocks it into the leg side, deep square leg has a fair distance to run in and they complete two without difficulty, 50 up, good start
pushed it a little fuller, was moving away, left alone by Younis
full on the off, crunches it towards mid-off, off the meat but can't find the gap
lovely, plenty of width and was the right length, got forward and cracked it past a diving extra cover and a diving mid-off, Smith gave chase but was unable to haul it back in
much closer to the off stump this time, gets forward and defends it solidly towards cover
bowls it on a good length just a fraction outside off, defended to mid-off
punched off the front foot to a slightly deepish mid-off to complete a comfortable single
short of a good length outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man to raise the 50-stand, looking threatening this one
a bit of width again, a little too much in fact as the batsman leaves it, called a wide
almost dragged it on, nipped back in a hint and he tried to chop it towards point, got an inside edge and it landed just wide of leg stump
shaping away from the right hander, tempting length but Younis isn't tempted, leaves it alone
full on the off, pushes it just wide of extra cover to sneak in a quick single
he's timing it brilliantly here, there is a bit of width and he just caresses it past a diving point, opened the face at the right time and it raced away
a single off an overthrow, punched straight to extra cover and Kallis took aim, needlessly, at the non-striker's end, much to his misfortune he scored a direct hit
slower one bowled short outside off, guided down to third man for a single

trapped in front! Straight ball on middle and leg, Hafeez was looking to be aggressive, moving well across to flick him over midwicket, missed and that looked out though we need a replay to confirm it, Daryl Harper had no doubt though. Replays suggest he was a gonner, hitting middle and leg
chipped over the covers into the deep for a single
bowls it on a good length outside off, gets forward and taps it watchfully to cover
short of a good length, punched hard but straight to short extra cover
on middle and leg, fuller, tickled to fine leg for a single
short of a good length, knocks it behind Duminy at point for a quick single
short and he shapes up for the pull, got a top edge onto the shoulder and it flew towards third man, just the single
down the leg side, a full toss, called a wide
slightly short outside off, is cracked hard off the back foot but there is a deep point in place, just the single
angling in towards middle, defended well towards extra cover
slower one bowled on a good length on middle, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
short of a good length, nips away and not for the first time, gets past the outside edge
shot but straight to the fielder, a stylish front-foot drive to a pitched-up delivery
short delivery outside off, bowled at 147.8 kmph, leaves it alone
short of a good length and it's guided straight towards point
tight line on middle, bowled at 131.3 kmph, defended off the back foot into the leg side
bowls it on a good length on the off, defended in front of extra cover, Shafiq calls for the single, Younis responds and there's no damage done
full down the leg side, fails to get a touch to it, he'll have to rebowl that, called a wide
shortish on the off, bowled at 136.4 kmph, gets on the back foot and drops it in front of point
fullish outside off, tries to flay it through the covers, ends up pushing it back to the bowler
short and it's smacked hard but Duminy flings himself to his right at point and saves a few runs
just a fraction wide of off and it's steered wide of Morkel at third man for a couple of runs
fullish on the off, driven towards mid-off who's at the edge of the circle, easy single in the end
aiming for the blockhole, fullish on the off, dug out towards extra cover
short on the off and it's pulled over midwicket, didn't quite get hold of it but it fell in no man's land and earned them a brace
short and pulled again, wide of deep midwicket this time, a couple of more runs
turned the face too early and was fortunate to get a boundary there, short of a good length, was targeting square leg, got an outside edge and it went to the third-man boundary instead
short delivery down the leg side, called by the umpire
drew him forward with a fullish delivery, leant forward to ease it past cover, got an inside edge onto his pads
short of a good length on the off, defended towards cover
shortish on the off, tried to punch it off the back foot, got an inside edge onto his pads and it dropped wide of the stumps, called for a single but was wisely sent back
flicks that straightish delivery towards deep square leg for a single
just a hint of inward movement, came in from outside off, pushed back to the bowler
turned away off the hips towards deep square leg for a single to keep strike, at the end of the second Powerplay Pakistan are in a good position with the experience of Younis to guide them through
flighted on the off stump, works it away towards deep square leg for a single
tossed up outside off, reaches forward and drives it through to long-off
turning in from outside off, dabs it in front of point
much closer to the stumps this time, turning in, defended into the leg side
fullish outside off, driven wide of Steyn at long-off for a single, they think of a second but Steyn is quick in getting rid of it
giving it some air is Botha, defended with a still head into the off side and it's drinks
short of a good length on middle, taps it behind square for a single
nips in just a hint from outside off, knocks it towards point, decides rightly against the single
short on the off stump, punched towards deep point for a single
nicely done, short of a good length delivery on middle and leg, moves across and glances it down fine
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it down to mid-on
shortish outside off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
significant turn there for Botha, came in from well outside off and there as a decent amount of bounce as well, took his bottom hand off as he played it down
tucked away in front of square for a single
short outside off, cut away towards deep point for a single
made room, waited for it to turn in which it did and slapped it straight to extra cover
pushed away in front of midwicket for a single
that one went straight on, defended into the off side in front of the keeper
Kallis drops it short and Shafiq cashes in, drags it from outside off past a diving mid-on for a boundary, brings up the 100
bowls it on a good length, defended towards point
short and pulled again, didn't time this one well enough though but still gets a couple in front of deep square leg
fuller outside off, opens the face and run it to third man for a single
short ball down the leg side, AB does well but that's a wide from Kallis
cracked through extra cover into the deep for a single
short of a good length outside off, chops it down to point
comes round the wicket and tosses it up, pushed into the leg side wide of midwicket for a single
short and turning in from outside off, tries to punch it hard, mistimes it to extra cover
pushes it quicker through the air, played straight to midwicket
quicker ball again but with some turn, Shafiq had made his mind up, paddled it over the keeper to beat fine leg to the boundary, actually came off the top edge
steps that and smacks the poor thing through extra cover, just the single
round the wicket to Younis, turns in, defended between point and cover, Younis thinks there's a single, Shafiq doesn't
a touch too straight from Kallis, tucked away through square leg for a single
shortish on leg stump, whipped away fine to fine leg for just the one
another wide from Kallis, down the leg side again
the offcutter there, bowled at 128.2 kmph, dropped it in front of point, thought of a single that wasn't there
short ball bowled slow, tries to cut, mistimes it to Duminy at point
cut in from outside off, pushed it through to midwicket, a couple of dot balls
on middle and leg, fullish, pushes it through the line to long-on for a single
You almost did, it stopped on Shafiq there as he tried to turn the face and hr got the leading edge that fell just short of extra cover
played into the leg side towards short fine leg
gets on the back foot and knocks it past point for a single
reaches forward to drive it through the off side, gets an inside edge just wide of short fine
gets forward and sweeps it, though not all too unconvincingly, over square leg for a couple of runs
closing the face and driving with the turn wide of square leg for a single to keep strike
short of a good length outside off, drops it short of point

run-out, pushed firmly off the front foot to Parnell at mid-on, races across for a single, Parnell picks it up cleanly and aims accurately at the stumps at the non-striker's end, Shafiq stretched quite a bit and the South Africans were not convinced they had their man but the replays show he was short of his ground by a couple of inches, timely breakthrough for South Africa just when it seemed Pakistan had built another threatening stand
guided down to third man for a single
short of a good length outside off, cracked slightly away from his body towards deep point for a single
punched past point into the deep for one more
shortish on the off, taps it just wide of point to sneak a single
tossed up outside off and Fawad went for the sweep, it turned away to beat the swing of the bat
short on middle, whipped just wide of short fine for a quick single
turning in from the off stump, worked behind square for one more
short of a length, quicker through the air, chopped wide of point for a single, they almost collided did the pair

missed run-out, a rare slip-up from the South African fielders today, turned wide of Duminy who was at midwicket, Younis called for a single and then decided to send Fawad, who was more than halfway down the pitch, back. Duminy returned a throw to the non-striker's end but Botha did a shoddy job trying to gather the ball. Fawad would have been out by a mile
pushed wide of cover for a single to keep strike
short of a good length on the off, punched off the back foot to extra cover
slightly straying on the pads, tries to work it fine, a single behind square for the batsman
nicely done, short of a length, cut away past point into the deep for a couple of runs
round the wicket to the left-hander, on middle and off, defended in front of cover, thought of a single but Younis sent him back

gone, Fawad squanders the opportunity he had been given in the last over, the off-side field was packed for the left-hander with several fielders inside the circle, it was bowled on a good length and he opted to chip it over the in-field but found extra cover instead, comfortable catch for David Miller, wrong choice of shot under the circumstances, didn't time it at all
nipped back in from a good length outside off, beaten through the gate, good start first up against a new batsman
gets it from outside off and turns it towards square leg, they complete a quick single and get one more on the overthrow
gets an outside edge, didn't turn in as Afridi was expecting, he closed the face, it took the edge and rolled past short third for three runs
pushed off the front foot to extra cover
driven uppishly past point for a single
gets across slightly and works it towards midwicket
quicker ball from round the wicket, struck off the meat but straight to extra cover
short of a good length on middle, played off the back foot to midwicket
slower one bowled full outside off, didn't pick it, went for a flowing drive, it cut back in to beat the bat
short outside off, run down to third man for a single
short on middle, Afridi goes for the pull and smacks it straight to Botha at midwicket
nipped back in from a good length, Afridi made a bit of room but in the end could only play it back to the bowler
short and it was in the zone for Afridi, rocked back and pulled it hard over midwicket for his first boundary
tossed up, lands slightly short, turns back in, moves back and thwacks it towards deep cover for a single
fetches it from outside off and sweeps it to deep backward square leg for a single
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot to long-on for a single
flighted on middle, tempting Afridi there, just played it back to the bowler who dived full length to his left to save a single
turned in from outside off, dabbed it in front of point for an easy single
turning in again, defended from the crease on the side of the pitch
exciting stuff, full on the off and it's mowed over the bowler's head to beat long-on to the ropes, was in the slot and he didn't waste the chance
angling in towards leg stump, is struck on the pads as he tries to close the face, would have slid down
shot, four more, overpitched again and Afridi takes full toll, cracking it between mid-off and extra cover for four more
struck on the pads again as he tries to nudge it into the leg side, would have missed leg again
three fours in the over, width from Steyn and he's not going to let them go to waste, powers it through extra cover for another one, hardly any risk, this one was along the ground
sensibly done, short of a good length outside off, keeps the strike by dabbing it down to third man for a single, Steyn's figures are in a mess
fires it on a good length outside off, Afridi chases it but makes no contact
turns it into the leg side wide of square leg for a single
Younis gets on the back foot, waits for it to turn in and taps it into the leg side for a single
gave him the charge and Botha fired it a yorker length, digs it out wide of extra cover and they complete a quick single, Afridi's bat is broken
gets on the back foot and punches it to long-on for a single
tossed up, moves well across even before it is delivered, just rolls his wrists on that one to play it past square leg for a single
short of a good length outside off, opens the face to guide it to point
shortish again, knocks it between point and cover to sneak a single
short, crunched off the back foot into the deep on the off side for a single
short and it's pulled hard over midwicket but Ingram's there in the deep and he keeps them down to a couple
sliding down the leg side this time and is called a wide, there have been a few of those in this innings thus far
the offcutter, dabbed to third man for a single
angles in towards middle, drops it in front of point and races off for a single that he completes with ease
Younis turns that one away towards square leg, a boundaryless knock this but he's rotating the strike

Afridi's thrown it away, Parnell takes a superbly-judged catch running in from long-off, Botha saw him come down and fired it quick outside off, Afridi was looking to launch that over long-off, mistimed it and Parnell, who's already effected a run-out this innings, ran in and dived forward to hold on to it inches from the ground
turns in from outside off, gets back and taps it wide of point to give Razzaq the strike
bowls it on a good length outside off, defended cautiously in front of the keeper
tried to cut that towards point but got it a little high on the bat and it went past extra cover instead, off the mark is Razzaq
plays it down to long-on for a single to keep the strike
shortish outside off, punched off the back foot to point
zipped through him, tried to open the face to play it past point, didn't connect
shortish on the off stump, chops it down to point, he's one away from a fifty
nips back in from a short of a length outside off, plays it back to the bowler, four dot balls this over
pushed it fuller this time, close to the stumps and Younis defended it solidly
half-century for Younis, like AB this was a workmanlike innings, pushed off the back foot to deep cover for a single, his job is only half done
tossed up on the off, pushed straight to midwicket off the front foot
gone! Botha oversteps, though, Stopped on him and Younis just lobbed it back to the bowler. Clearly overstepped, so a freehit coming
full toss and he fails to cash in, cracks it to long-on for a single
turning in from outside off, defended into the off side
a gentle push off the front foot to extra cover
opens the face and knocks it in front of point to steal a quick single
struck hard by Younis but can;'t get it past Ingram at short extra cover who dives to his left to save a run
short of a good length outside off, punched straight to point, the required rate is over six
short outside off, slaps it towards deep point for a single
bowls it full on the off, Younis targets extra cover but it strikes the inside half of the bat and rolls back to the bowler
fullish on leg stump, walks across to drive it past midwicket, is struck on the pads, stifled appeal from Morne, would have slid down
short and wide and Razzaq chases it, trying to slash it over point, misses and it's called a wide
made room and the bowler chased him, tried to flick it square, got a thick inside edge down to fine leg for a single
short and it's struck hard off the back foot past point, deep points runs across and keeps them down to a couple
shortish on the off, pushed off the back foot wide of extra cover for a quick single, an attempt at the stumps at the sstriker's end, would have made it anyway
slower ball on leg stump, tickles it wide of the keeper down towards fine leg for a couple of runs
shortish on the off, drops it in front of point, calls for a single that isn't there and is sent back
slower one bowled on middle and leg, clipped away behind deep square leg for a couple of runs
came back in this time, Younis dropped it down on the pitch but didn;'t know for a moment where the ball went, landed just behind the stumps
slower offcutter on middle, pushed through to midwicket, a dot ball to end the over
yorker length outside off, dug out back to the bowler
bowls it on a good length on middle, Razzaq gets across and works it through square leg for a single, a direct-hit and they get another one off the ricochet
bowls it on a length on the off, pushed uppishly towards long-off for a single
Younis gets his first boundary, pitched up outside off and he lofts it over mid-off for a four, cleanly struck
the fielder is pushed back and he just punches it down the ground to long-off for one more
a horrible short delivery down the leg side, a wide and the pressure's easing
another wide down the leg side, too many of them today
bowls it on a good length on middle, Razzaq watches it determinedly onto the bat
Younis steps out of the track and chips it towards long-on for a single
short on leg stump, pushed away off the back foot through square leg for one more
fullish on the off, gets forward and pushes it towards extra cover
driven along the ground to long-off for a single
bowled it fullish on middle, turned the face to play it to midwicket
shortish on leg stump, turned away from the crease towards short fine, no run again
short of a good length outside off, placed between point and cover, just the single
bangs it short and Razzaq goes for the pull, it's a miscue but he's fortunate it lands nowhere, picks a single
the offcutter this time, gets on the back foot and defends it towards extra cover, no single this time
nipped in from a good length on the off, turned slightly uppishly towards midwicket
slower one bowled short on the off, drops it in front of midwicket and is off
short of a good length again, pushed off the back foot straight to Duminy at point
pushed through quick on a length on the off, walks across and flicks it through square leg
bowled full on the off, driven through the line to long-off for a single
driven down the ground to long-on for a single again
flighted, lands full outside off, square-driven towards deep point for one more
nicely placed by Younis, drove it wide of Steyn at long-off and ran back comfortably for the second
turning in from a good length on the off, presents the straight bat while playing it back to the bowler
short outside off, cut away hard but straight to Duminy at point
Razzaq is lucky again, was short on middle and leg, tried to whip it to midwicket, got a leading edge and it fell short of everyone
pitched it up on the off, driven hard down the ground to long-off
short on the off, gets on the back foot and runs it down to third man for a single
slower one bowled full on middle, plays the on-drive but straight to midwicket
short of a good length, dabs it towards point, Younis wants the single but Razzaq is smart enough to send him back, there was no run there
short on leg stump, clips it down towards fine leg for a single
slower one bowled on the off, turns the face to place it between midwicket and deep square leg, played gently to give them enough time to come back for the second
short on the off, knocked back past the bowler for a single
short on the off, opens the face a hint and pushes it to point, can't get it through the in-field

missed run-out, short on middle, pulled away to midwicket who's at the edge of the circle, Botha returned a good throw to Steyn at the non-striker's end and the bowler fumbled, Razzaq was gone had he collected cleanly, an opportunity missed, he went for the single that wasn't there and survived
dropped it behind point from the crease to keep the strike

gone! Younis losing his concentration for just a second there, appeared to be a harmless delivery bowled on a good length outside off, went loosely at it, trying to drive it towards extra cover, got an inside edge and timber!
pushed off the front foot into the off side towards extra cover, decides against the single, direct hit at the non-striker's end but Razzaq is safely in

run-out, a suicidal run there, full on the off and it's driven straight to mid-off who's standing quite close to the non-striker's end, Rehman rushes through though Razzaq isn't interested, a safe throw to the keeper's end and AB takes it on the ahlf-volley and takes off the bails, brainless cricket there costing Pakistan another wicket. Rehman goes
short of a good length outside off, nipped back in and Haider let it through
short of a length outside off and Haider chases it, can't connect but it's called a wide
lands on a good length, gets forward and pushes it down to mid-off
bouncer, banged in on middle and Haider ducks, another dot ball, could this be the decisive over?
short on middle and Razzaq pulls it away square, fine leg is up and there's no protection in the deep and he finds the boundary
shortish on the off, punched from the crease towards deep cover for a single
shortish on middle, gets across and pushes it past midwicket for a single
shortish outside off, cut just behind Duminy for a single
nicely placed, lands on a good length and he opens the face to bisect the gap between point and cover for a couple of runs
on target this time, on the off stump and he can only push it to point
short of a good length, cut towards point but Duminy's there
short on middle, pulled away in front of deep midwicket for a couple of runs
full outside off, in the slot and he creams it but straight to Amla at deep point, just the single
short on the off, turns it off the back foot, a jab, in front of deep square leg, another single
short outside off and it's smashed but again straight to Amla in the deep
banged it short on middle, helped it wide of AB behind square for a single to keep the strike
bowled full on middle and leg, pushed away straight to midwicket
short on middle, tries to fend it away, caught on the glove, it drops short of point, Razzaq calls for the single and makes it easily
full outside off, Razzaq went for it, he wanted to send that into the stands over midwicket, missed and it didn't miss the stumps by much, lucky escape

superb effort by Morne Morkel, deceived by the slower one, was into it too early and got the top edge, Morkel was at short fine and he ran miles back and dived full length but couldn't reach it, they get two in the meantime
unfortunate for Steyn, short outside off and it's slashed hard as he makes room, gets a thick outside edge well wide of AB to the third-man boundary
slower one bowled full outside off, dug out back to the bowler who can't field it over his head and concedes a run that allows Razzaq to stay on strike for the next over

gone, Razzaq wants to send that back to Abu Dhabi, bowled on a good length outside off and he made room and freed his arms, got a thick edge, big nick and straight to AB who makes no mistake, Morne's the man, he's picked up three including Younis and Razzaq. South Africa have their noses ahead now.
rose up from a good length and he was struck on the glove, some extra bounce there, a single to third man
angling in towards off stump, forced off the back foot but straight to point
sightly short outside off, tight line, guides it down to third man, an excellent over this

dropped by Graeme Smith, fullish and Wahab swung wildly at it, miscued it and the captain at midwicket appeared to overrun the ball there, never got under it and had to dive in the end with the hope of it sticking in...it didn't
short outside off, runs it down to third man for a single to retain the strike, superb stuff from Morne
mistake, mistake, strays on the pads with the fine leg inside the circle, Haider helps it on its way to the ropes
shortish outside off, opens the face to steer it to third man for a single
four more, down the leg side again, poor bowling from Steyn here, Wahab flicks it fine to beat the diving short fine
ooh, short of a good length, holds its line, Wahab tries to edge it past the keeper but can't make contact

shot! Short of a good length, plenty of width and he thwacks it between point and cover for three more, the throw was at Steyn's end and he could have tried to dislodge the bails at the non-striker's end but instead aimed at the striker's end, confusion all around, Pakistan very much in it still
ooh, beaten as he tries to open the face, disappointing returns from Steyn on his comeback from a break
Wahab's turning it on, short on the off and he wallops it over midwicket for a boundary, he played a nice cameo in the last match and he's repeating it here
bowled on a length, was in the slot, was targeting midwicket, didn't time it well enough, just the single this time
Haider eases it through the covers into the deep for a single to give Wahab the strike
connects well, full outside off, makes room and carts him over the in-field on the off side for three more, Duminy runs across and cuts it off

chaos all around! Haider plays it back to the bowler, Wahab had backed up too far, Morne took aim at the non-striker's end and missed, conceded two more overthrows, no one was there to collect the throw, two more, he was out if that had hit, was it a risk worth taking?
Haider defends it towards point and takes off but is sent back, the fielder doesn't throw, dot ball to end the over but Pakistan have snuck ahead
low full toss outside off, is played back to the bowler, dot ball, dot ball
low full toss again, drilled down the ground to long-on, well fielded, just the single, struck well but found the fielder, just the one

is that a run-out? Lands on a good length, pushed back to the bowler, Wahab called for a run when there wasn't one, Haider rightly sent him back, Parnell gathered the ball and played safe, ran back, took his time to take off the bails and did so just in time, Wahab was short of his crease when the bails were dislodged, senseless attempt at a run and Pakistan are now nine down

missed run-out, chaos, utter chaos, chipped over midwicket, they attempt the second, Parnell takes the widish throw and tries to flick it onto the stumps at the non-striker'e end but misses, scores level, scores level
all over, Pakistan have sealed a thrilling win, short and he pulls it for a single behind square
